price: Mu vy’ukuri n’imbere y’ugukingirwa nya bihano, twahora dutakambira Imana Allah, mu kuyisaba tutayibangikanya, ko Yobidukingira. Mu vy’ukuri, ni Yo Mugiranezamurivyose, Nyenimbabazi ku batoni bayo”.
arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

meta.transliteration: innā kunnā min qablu nadʿūhu innahu huwa al-baru al-raḥīmu
